items.summary: Update the User Dashboard header so the logged-in user name is visually prominent (larger size + attractive designer-chosen coloring/gradient) and does not appear as plain white text. Keep the header showing both the numeric user ID and the user name, and apply the styling consistently for any user (including the example user OPU, id=1).

Adjust the User Dashboard main (dashboard) layout so the four action tiles (Production, Payment/Loan, Work, Snack) and the clock card fit within the viewport without the tiles overflowing outside the screen. Reduce the visual size of the tiles (card padding/icon/text/aspect where needed) and make the clock card slightly smaller so the dashboard content fits on-screen without requiring vertical scrolling to reach the tiles on common mobile devices.

Restyle the new user registration form (RegisterView) so it has a clear, attractive color theme (designer choice) rather than appearing uncolored/plain. Apply cohesive colors to the registration card background, form fields (borders/focus), headings, and primary submit button while keeping readability and contrast.
